actions: Releases the exterior with acrid and cold herbs
clinicalManifestations: Exterior-excess, wind-cold síndrome: aversion to cold, fever, headache, neck stiffness, body aches and pains, absence of perspiration, dyspnea, a thin, white tongue coating, and a superficial, tight pulse
pharmacologicalEffects: Effect on temperatura regulation, antitussive, antibiotic, cardiovascular, radioprotective
contraindications: Individuals with ulceration, abscesses and sores; lin zheng; and patients with bleeding or excessive bleeding on the verge of collapse
cautions: Elderly patients and individuals with generalized weakness
modernResearch: Fever, upper respiratory tract infection, cough, peripheral neuropathy, enuresis, mastitis
